title: Extracting a Byte from a DWORD
description: BYTE_OF_DWORD extracts a byte (B0 .. B3) a DWORD. The individual byï¿¾tes are selected with 0-3 at the input IN.
name: BYTE_OF_DWORD

input.name: in
input.description: The DWORD value from which a byte will be extracted.

input.name: N
input.description: The index of the byte to extract from the DWORD, multiplied by 8 to account for bit shifts.

output.name: BYTE_OF_DWORD
output.description: The extracted byte from the specified position of the input DWORD.

return_value.description: The resulting byte obtained from the extraction process.
